Enter IOTA seed Seed is too short Seed is too long Seed has mixed case characters. Lowercase will be converted to uppercase Seed contains invalid characters. Only uppercase characters from A-Z and the number 9 are accepted Seed should not contain more than 81 characters. Extra characters are ignored Seed does not contain enough characters. Insecure seed Node is not fully synced Please wait for the current process to finish
Not yet implemented Please valid address required Please enter an IOTA amount Not enough IOTA Only uppercase characters from A-Z and the number 9 are accepted. Please enter a valid tag. Misc Active Wallet All Wallets Neighbors Active Node @string/action_settings App Details Details about run IOTA app
Delete data Log out of app and delete all stored data, you should backup all seeds before performing this action. Search Messaging Network All Nodes
Connect to Node Move to Top Move up One Remove node Node options Node no longer active on IOTA Add Node Enter your own node details or select from the list App will connect descending order to the first Node that is in Sync, move nodes to the top to be first connect priority At last one node required, add one, then delete this node
Tor Tor - Orbot You can enable the app to connect to iota nodes via Tor, all http, https traffic routed through the Orbot app
Tor required Could not detect the Tor app To use Tor for all internet traffic in this app Orbot for Android app is required, you can get it on Google Play Show Tor in the Navigation bar
Tor Settings Toggle Tor Make app use Tor for all http and https internet traffic after a restart
If you have specific proxy settings for Tor, you can set them here host port Leave blank if no user and password needed user password
Tor start Tor connecting Tor connected
Restarting app now for new Tor settings

Reply Delete message Copy to clipboard Cancel Double No complete Unknown Enter number or name Enter a message to send Choose someone to send to Layout Bottom up Layout Top down Add Person Creating new message address Enter message Start by typing an identifying name of your choice Enter Nickname, email, anything really... Create Messaging must be 5–20 characters, no spaces Cannot remove minimum of 1 Seed required, See Settings Delete data to remove This pending transfer has been marked as no complete as one or more of the pay from addresses have a zero balance so the transfer cannot currently complete With IOTA transfers, Addresses are generally only used to make payments from only once as out-going payments lessen the security of the Address You can change how the app handles these No complete pending payments in the setting area You should contact the sender of the payment to discuss about how to settle this transfer Click any item below to see it on: Copy all details to Clipboard Copied to Clipboard Filtered
Available Pig locked
View Messy? see the settings to tidy it tap me Live Available Future
Default is You can set the prefered Address security value, default is 2 Change Address Security Click back to continue Finished, after the refresh any new balance will appear Generating Address with the new security setting Sorry, you can only use this feature on non-zero, non-used addresses Change the address security value. This will also change the address shown. Do not perform this if you are expecting a payment onto this address, if you ever want to get the original address back after changing, you will need to Delete and restart the Wallet. If you were expecting a non-zero balance on this address, you can try changing to a different security setting.
Do not nudge Make Active Wallet Add Seed View Wallet Seed Remove Seed Add Seed Wallet Add Node Make Piggy bank address Break Piggy bank address Sorry, Maximum of 5 Seeds allowed Locked

Node Node settings
Node protocol The protocol of the node you would like to connect
Node IP or www domain The IP address of the node you would like to connect
Node port The port of the node you would like to connect
Security Seed and password settings
Show seed
Display current seed
Show messaging seed Display the IOTA seed used for messaging
Change Password Change current password
Protect seed Set-up password protection
App Settings Nudge attempts, PoW, First load
Display Settings Options to set how you view your wallet
Address auto attach Minimum number of Empty value pooled addresses
Nudge attempts Number of times the app will Nudge (promote) a transfer before giving up
First Load Addresses Number of Addresses the app will check up to when performing the First load of a seed
First Load Range Number of empty Addresses the app will check after finding a balance before stopping
Local PoW Do the Proof of work locally
Enable anonymous use of Iota through Tor
Double and No complete Transfers Show Double spend and No complete transfers in the \'Actions\' section
Used Addresses Show used Addresses in the \'Receive\' section
Nudge and Attachments Show Nudges and Address attachments in the \'Actions\' section
Report issue Report issue or submit feedback
Currency The currency in which the wallet value is displayed
Address security Default address security setting when generating new addresses
Auto Logout Logout app after inactive use
Min Weight Min Weight value to use for transfers
Empty node protocol not allowed. Node protocol not allowed. Empty node IP not allowed. Empty node port not allowed.

Welcome run IOTA provides an easy to use fast wallet for your everyday IOTA use
Change app colour
Sky Royal Urgent Boring
Copy address Copy hash
Request to this address Nudge (promote) transfer Re-send transfer Why No complete? Wrong password Current Seed: Set App password Set your login password Enter new password Set your new login password Forgot your password? Sorry, there is no recover option. Please delete app and re-install to remove the current setup Root check Device failed one or more root checks and is assumed to be rooted. Continue at your own risk? Sending to a used address! You are attempting to send a transaction to an address that has already been used. Please ask recipient for a new address. Private Key Reuse Detected! Used Address found. IOTA Addresses should not be used to send more than once. Wait for previous transaction to confirm, by Nudging, before sending another transaction.
Confirm send transfer?
Confirm Delete all data and logout?\nYou will lose all seeds if you don\'t have a full backup!
Click cancel, then choose Show seed to copy this Seed
About Neighbors Active Node Login New Transfer Wallet
Remove Seed
QR Code
Generate QR code Send transfer
Time Status Confirmed Internal Pending in Pending out Pending Message My Address actions Other Address actions Address Tag Hash Signature Current index Last index Bundle: Trunk transaction: Branch transaction: Nonce
Help and FAQ Active Wallet Area Actions Show all actions on Addresses for the active Wallet Nudge Transfer If a transfer is pending for a while, try Nudging (Promoting / re-attaching) it No complete No complete transfers are when the app detects a transfer that will (most likely) never complete, these are then marked No complete and depending on your settings are defaulted to be not included in Address balances Receive Lists all active Addresses with balances for the active Wallet
Piggy Bank Addresses 🐷 Mark an address as a Piggy Bank to ensure the app will not use that address when making transfers, you need to remove the pig before spending with the Address Pig Locked Pig can only be broken when pending balances are completed If an Address has pending transfers, the address will be locked from outgoing payments Change Address Security option Use this to get Specific with the way your Wallet Addresses are created, by default the security value is 2 unless changed. If you have changed the address, but want the original address back, you will need to remove the Wallet Seed and Re-load again
Key Positive balance transfer (receive IOTA) Negative balance transfer (send IOTA) Internal (inter-wallet) transfer Address attachment to IOTA Transfer completed Nudge (promote) count Nudge transfer Address (promote) name Address security value
All Wallets Area The all wallets area provides management of your Seeds, you can also see latest currency data Add Seed Add a new Wallet Seed by click the + plus button Remove Seed This will remove the Seed from the wallet, make sure you have backed up the Seed before doing this
Network Area View and Manage the Iota node your connected to All Nodes In the All Nodes area you can see the current connected node and manage other nodes, the order of connecting, and which ones you want to use, Select from the list or provide your own
Settings ⚙️ Control how run Iota works for you Change Password 🔐 Change the password used to access the app Address Security 🔐 Change the default Security value to use when generating addresses Automatic Addresses 🎚 Change the number of empty zero balance addresses to keep Nudge Attempts 🎚 If auto nudge is turned on, the app will wait 5 IOTA milestones (~10 minutes) for a pending out Transfer, then Nudge promote the Transfer Min Weight 🔐 Change the Min Weight value to use for transfers Delete data ❌ Wipe all data and log out of the app, make sure you have a full backup of all Seeds before doing Local POW 💪🏾 Do calculations for Transfers on this device, on mobile phones this usually makes Iota transfers slower Currency 💵 Change the default currency to compare your IOTA to
Beta 🔨🔧 run IOTA is considered still under development, this is the first release and has only been tested with a limited number of devices internally If you have any issues, get in contact, 🐞 bugs can be fixed 🔧
